description: Dev Server target options for Build Facade.
title: Dev Server Target

___verbose.description: Adds more details to output logging.

___sslCert.description: SSL certificate to use for serving HTTPS.

___servePath.description: The pathname where the app will be served.

___poll.description: Enable and define the file watching poll time period in milliseconds.

___disableHostCheck.description: Don't verify connected clients are part of allowed hosts.

___publicHost.description: The URL that the browser client (or live-reload client, if enabled) should use to connect to the development server. Use for a complex dev server setup, such as one with reverse proxies.

___sslKey.description: SSL key to use for serving HTTPS.

___deployUrl.description: URL where files will be deployed.

___liveReload.description: Whether to reload the page on change, using live-reload.

___aot.description: Build using Ahead of Time compilation.

___hmrWarning.description: Show a warning when the --hmr option is enabled.

___hidden.description: Output sourcemaps used for error reporting tools.

___open.description: Opens the url in default browser.

___commonChunk.description: Use a separate bundle containing code used across multiple bundles.

___progress.description: Log progress to the console while building.

___baseHref.description: Base url for the application being built.

___scripts.description: Enables optimization of the scripts output.

___styles.description: Enables optimization of the styles output.

___optimization.description: Enables optimization of the build output.

___vendorChunk.description: Use a separate bundle containing only vendor libraries.

___servePathDefaultWarning.description: Show a warning when deploy-url/base-href use unsupported serve path values.
